plants.name: Tomatoes
plants.plantingzone: Plant next to Potatoe varieties and cabbage if possible
plants.growinfo: These need full sun, and to be planted in a well drained area.

plants.name: Potatoes
plants.plantingzone: These flourish around any number of other veegetables, recommended to keep them around other tubing plants
plants.growinfo: Potatoes wil grow best in full sunlight, also require well drained soil.
plants.whentogrow: Plant your potatoes in March, April or May for best results.

plants.name: Boxwood
plants.plantingzone: Plant these as shrubs next to your home or business.
plants.growinfo: These enjoy hot sunlight and require a decent draining area (plant using woodchips)

plants.name: Cabbage
plants.plantingzone: Plant in an area that receives up to 6 hours of sunlight.
plants.growinfo: Plant in a mix of soil and compost for best results and full leaves.

plants.name: Cucumber
plants.plantingzone: Plant on trellace or fence, somewhere it can spread
plants.growinfo: Good Drainage and Sunlight. This is a vine.

plants.name: Carrotts
plants.growinfo: Plant in a mix of loose sandy soil for best results

plants.name: Onions
plants.plantingzone: In-ground gardens and raised beds. Space onions 6-inches apart.
plants.growinfo: Require fertile, well drained soil, & plenty of sun.

plants.name: Onions
plants.plantingzone: Space 4-6 inches apart in rows that are at least 1 foot apart.
plants.growinfo: Require fertile, well drained soil, & plenty of sun.

plants.name: Chives
plants.plantingzone: Grow near if not under shade.
plants.growinfo: Make sure to incorporate 4 to 6 inches of well composted soil.
plants.whentogrow: Early Spring 4-6 weeks before the last frost.

plants.name: Cauliflower
plants.growinfo: Plant in open sunlight and compost for best results.

plants.name: Squash
plants.plantingzone: Plant in raised bed or in-ground garden.
plants.growinfo: These require 6 or more hours of sunlight in well drained soil.
plants.whentogrow: Plant during the last two weeks of spring.

plants.name: Broccoli
plants.plantingzone: Try to plant not in direct extreme heat but next to cauliflower in similar conditions.
plants.growinfo: Needs well drained soil with plenty of compost & organic matter.

plants.name: Watermelon
plants.plantingzone: Plant 6 feet apart with 3 seeds to a mound.
plants.growinfo: Remove less than vigorous seedlings after 8 days.
